## SendableLiquity.redeemDebtToken() method

Redeem DebtToken to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
redeemDebtToken(amount: Decimalish, maxRedemptionRate?: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, RedemptionDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

amount


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

Amount of DebtToken to be redeemed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

maxRedemptionRate


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

Maximum acceptable [redemption rate](./lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [RedemptionDetails](./lib-base.redemptiondetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

If `maxRedemptionRate` is omitted, the current redemption rate (based on `amount`<!-- -->) plus 0.1% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
